title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the TravelConcierge project, including customer service workflows across all channels, integrations with relevant systems (CRM, booking platforms, etc.), personalization features, data models, security considerations, performance requirements, and a clear roadmap for each feature development.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integrations with existing systems. Consider factors such as scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Provide a high-level overview as well as detailed component diagrams and data flow diagrams. To ensure compatibility and cohesion with other project aspects, the design should adhere to the TravelConcierge style guide and documentation standards. Collaborate with team members during this process to facilitate seamless integration of your solution.

title: Design User Interface for TravelConcierge
description: Design the user interface for customer service agents, considering usability, accessibility, branding guidelines, and integration with backend systems. Ensure that the design aligns with our principles of delivering personalized service across all channels throughout the customer journey in the travel and hospitality industry.

title: Design Data Storage and Management Strategy
description: Design the data storage and management strategy, focusing on customer data, service logs, personalization profiles, ensuring scalability, data security, privacy, and compliance with industry standards. Incorporate feedback from relevant stakeholders during the design process.

title: Define Security and Compliance Requirements for TravelConcierge
description: Identify, document, and prioritize security and compliance requirements, including data privacy, access controls, industry regulations (e.g., PCI-DSS, GDPR), and any specific requirements for the travel and hospitality industry. Ensure alignment with best practices in the field.

title: Plan for Deployment and Operations
description: Clearly define the deployment strategy, infrastructure requirements, monitoring, and maintenance processes for the TravelConcierge application, considering scalability, reliability, security, and cost-effectiveness. Collaborate with relevant teams to ensure seamless integration of these aspects with the overall system architecture.

title: Review and Approve System Design
description: Review and approve the system design, including architecture, user interface, data management, security, and deployment plans.
